body_html: Since there's no single official procedure, I created a couple of scripts to perform the training/validation in different processes (which we used to participate in a machine learning challenge). If you wanna take a look, they're here: https://github.com/learningtitans/isbi2017-part3#deep-learning-component-model-rc30 — the most relevant code is a shell script in ./etc/launch_validation_loop.sh.

body: Since there's no single official procedure, I created a couple of scripts to perform the training/validation in different processes (which we used to participate in a machine learning challenge). If you wanna take a look, they're here: https://github.com/learningtitans/isbi2017-part3#deep-learning-component-model-rc30 — the most relevant code is a shell script in [./etc/launch_validation_loop.sh](https://github.com/learningtitans/isbi2017-part3/blob/master/etc/launch_validation_loop.sh).
